performance_at_interview_what_to_improve:
Teaching is full of challenges that demand appropriate solutions. During your assessment we did not see sufficient creativity, innovation, subject pedagogy and knowledge of your chosen subject in your responses to suggest that you are ready for our intensive programme




Subject knowledge is the major issue.  A Level is the highest Geography qualification achieved and in the interview. I am not confident that his subject knowledge is good enough to teach to A Level.  In order to enhance any future applications, we would recommend that Sam enhances his Geography subject knowledge through further study.
